titleStmt.title: Two sermons one preached at Paules Crosse December 20. By Roger Lea Master of Arts, of Iesus-Colledge in Cambridge: and preacher at S. Leonards Shorditch, in Middlesex, by London. Another preached in Paules-Church, Decemb. 26, being S. Steuens day, by Iohn Squire, Master of Arts, of the same Colledge: and preacher of the same parish
titleStmt.author: Ley, Roger, b. 1593 or 4.

titleStmt.title: Two sermons one preached at Paules Crosse December 20. By Roger Lea Master of Arts, of Iesus-Colledge in Cambridge: and preacher at S. Leonards Shorditch, in Middlesex, by London. Another preached in Paules-Church, Decemb. 26, being S. Steuens day, by Iohn Squire, Master of Arts, of the same Colledge: and preacher of the same parish
titleStmt.author: Ley, Roger, b. 1593 or 4.
Squire, John, ca. 1588-1653. Sermon preached in Pauls church upon Saint Stevens fay. 1618. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. I[ones] for Nicholas Bourne, and are to be sold at the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: The first sermon has a separate title page, with same imprint as general title page, reading: The scepter of righteousnes, a sermon preached at Paules-Crosse. December 20. 1618. By Roger Ley, Master of Art and minister of Gods word in Shorditch.
"A sermon preached in Pauls church vpon Saint Stevens day. 1618" has caption title.
Errata on recto of I2, final leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
